com.ibm.mce.sdk.api

Class MceApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • Application
      • com.ibm.mce.sdk.api.MceApplication
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SdkInitLifecycleCallbacks

    public class MceApplication
extends Application
implements SdkInitLifecycleCallbacks
    This class should be extended by applications that use the MCE sdk.

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentForegroundActivity

        public static java.lang.Class getCurrentForegroundActivity()
        Retrieves the current application activity which is in the foreground.
        Returns:
        The foreground activity or null if there is no foreground activity.

      • onCreate

        public void onCreate()
        This method initializes the SDK. If you extend this class and override this method, make sure you call super.omCreate() or the SDK initialization will fail to start.

        This method is called when metadata is loaded

      • init

        public static void init(Application application,
                        SdkInitLifecycleCallbacks callbacks)
        This method initiates the sdk
        Parameters:

        callbacks - The initialization callback implementation. Can be null

      • init

        public static void init(Application application,
                        MceSdkConfiguration mceSdkConfiguration,
                        SdkInitLifecycleCallbacks callbacks)
        This method initiates the sdk. It will only be done if tentative init is not set to true or if the sdk was initiated before
        Parameters:
        application - The application object
        mceSdkConfiguration - The mce configuration
        callbacks - The initialization callback implementation. Can be null

      • firstInit

        public static void firstInit(Application application,
                             MceSdkConfiguration mceSdkConfiguration,
                             SdkInitLifecycleCallbacks callbacks)
        This method initiates the sdk regardless of tentative configuration
        Parameters:
        application - The application object
        mceSdkConfiguration - The mce configuration
        callbacks - The initialization callback implementation. Can be null
